# Peachtree Community Food Pantry

**Serving Atlanta's Midtown neighborhood since 2015**

## Location
450 Piedmont Ave NE, Atlanta, GA 30308

## Hours of Operation
- **Monday:** 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM
- **Wednesday:** 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM
- **Friday:** 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM
- **2nd Saturday of each month:** 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM

## Who We Serve
We provide groceries to individuals and families in need. Our food pantry is open to all Atlanta residents.

## What to Bring
- Valid photo ID (driver's license, state ID, or passport)
- Proof of Atlanta residency (utility bill, lease, or mail with current address)

## Rules
- One visit per household per week
- Please arrive at least 30 minutes before closing
- First-come, first-served basis

## What We Offer
Each family receives a bag of groceries including:
- Canned goods
- Fresh produce (when available)
- Bread and bakery items
- Dairy products
- Personal hygiene items

## Contact
Phone: (404) 555-0150
Email: info@peachtreepantry.org

## Important Notice
**Holiday Schedule:** We will be closed December 23 - January 2 for the holiday season. Happy Holidays!
